alert.note: Alert for Nez Perce (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 27 at 3:09PM MDT until further notice by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of North Central Idaho, including the following county, Nez Perce. * WHEN...Until 400 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 207 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in Bedrock Burn Area. - Bedrock Burn Area is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.2 to 0.4 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Burned areas near Lenore. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Move away from recently burned areas. Flooding of creeks and road may occur as well as the potential for rock or mud slides.
